MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the SY23 postcode area of Aberystwyth, affecting properties in  Llanfarian and surrounding areas.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:05PM.  In order to complete repairs to the overhead line network, engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties at 6:30PM and we expect all power to be restored by 9PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:43PM on 11th March 2021
